sentences.sContent: a tactic employed to speed up the peace process
sentences.sCn: 为加速和平进程而采取的策略

sentences.sContent: Republicans accuse Democrats of using delaying tactics (= something you do in order to give yourself more time ) to prevent a final vote on the bill.
sentences.sCn: 共和党指责民主党采取拖延战术来阻止议案的最终票决。

sentences.sContent: Shock tactics are being used in an attempt to stop drink drivers.
sentences.sCn: 正在采取“震慑策略”来制止司机酒后驾车。

remMethod.val: tact(接触) + ic → 通过手段来接触 → 手段

words.tran: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的

trans.tranOther: a method that you use to achieve something
